Scope and Contents
This collection consists of research files and correspondence pertaining to the history of aviation in the Spanish Civil War. These materials were compiled by ALBA archivist Victor Berch and historian Richard S. Allen. The collection is a compilation of primary and secondary sources, research notes, and photocopies of articles, clippings, documents, and ephemera.
